metadata.title: Bracketron PHV-202-BL Grip-iT GPS and Mobile Device Holder (Black)
features: Compatible with all horizontal air vent louvers
Allows for portrait and landscape viewing
Mounts to air conditioning/heating vent in your vehicle and keeps your device secure
Made of durable ABS plastic that holds up to wear and tear
Adjustable Arms open from 1.5" to 4.5" wide to accommodate wide range GPS and other mobile devices
Provides a secure mounting option with easy installation
Mounts to air conditioning/heating vent in your vehicle and keeps your device secure
Made of durable ABS plastic that holds up to wear and tear
Adjustable Arms open from 1.5" to 4.5" wide to accommodate wide range GPS and other mobile devices
Provides a secure mounting option with easy installation
description: Provides a stable, secure dashboard mount for your portable GPS and other handheld devices. The GPS Grip-iT universal holder is designed for all popular GPS models most portable mobile electronic devices. Grip-iT connects to the louvers of your vehicle’s air vent for easy access. The unique design allows the clamping arms to open up to 4.5” wide to accommodate most portable electronic devices..

The PHV-202-BL Grip-iT Universal Holder is designed for GPS devices and other portable mobile electronics. The included Adjustable Rotating Air Vent Mount makes for easy mounting to the louvers of your vehicles air vent to provide a stable, secure, and easily accessible mounting solution for your portable device. Also included is a T-Slot AMPS Adapter Plate for use with any of Bracketrons Custom Mounting Solutions. PHV-202-BL boasts adjustable arms that open from 1.5 to 4.5 inches wide, to accommodate an extensive range GPS and other mobile devices. The arms also adjust up or down, allowing easy access to device buttons or controls. Made of durable ABS plastic that holds up to wear and tear, the PHV-202-BL gives you a a secure mounting option with easy installation.
Grip-iT GPS & Mobile Device Holder, Adjustable Rotating Air Vent Mount, T-Slot AMPS Adapter Plate, Installation Instructions
